t: Register new agents in config, hierarchy, and TOON files
mh: All 6 new roles in company-hierarchy.md Agent Roster
resolve-agent-model.sh handles all new role names
TOON files updated for 3 departments with new agents
obj: Register all 6 new agent roles (be-security, fe-security, ux-security, documenter, fe-documenter, ux-documenter) in shared configuration and reference files. Update TOON files for all 3 departments. Update Lead to absorb Solution Q&A.

a: Add 6 new roles to config/model-profiles.json. For each profile: quality: fe-security=sonnet, ux-security=sonnet, documenter=haiku, fe-documenter=haiku, ux-documenter=haiku (security=sonnet already exists); balanced: same as quality; budget: fe-security=haiku, ux-security=haiku, documenter=haiku, fe-documenter=haiku, ux-documenter=haiku. Security reviewers use sonnet (need reasoning for vulnerability detection). Documenters use haiku (mechanical documentation generation, token-efficient).
v: jq '.quality["fe-security"]' config/model-profiles.json returns sonnet; jq '.balanced.documenter' config/model-profiles.json returns haiku; jq '.budget["ux-security"]' config/model-profiles.json returns haiku

a: Add 6 new agents to references/company-hierarchy.md: (1) Agent Roster table — 6 new rows: yolo-fe-security (FE Security Reviewer | Sonnet | Read,Grep,Glob,Bash,SendMessage | security-audit.jsonl | 3000), yolo-ux-security (UX Security Reviewer | Sonnet | Read,Grep,Glob,SendMessage | security-audit.jsonl | 2000), yolo-documenter (Backend Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write,Bash | docs.jsonl | 2000), yolo-fe-documenter (FE Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | docs.jsonl | 2000), yolo-ux-documenter (UX Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | docs.jsonl | 2000). (2) Update Multi-Department Structure table: Backend 9 agents (add security, documenter), Frontend 9 (add fe-security, fe-documenter), UI/UX 9 (add ux-security, ux-documenter). Total: ~36 agents. (3) Update Quality Team section: add Security Reviewers per dept. (4) Decision Authority Matrix: add documenter row (CAN: doc structure, content selection; MUST escalate: scope changes, architecture docs). (5) Update 11-Step Workflow table: add optional Step 8.5 Documentation (Documenter, config-gated). (6) Add Documenter to Escalation Table: Documenter -> Lead (findings only).
v: grep -c 'yolo-fe-security' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 2; grep -c 'yolo-documenter' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 2; grep -c '36' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 1

a: Add all new role names to scripts/resolve-agent-model.sh case statement: fe-security, ux-security, documenter, fe-documenter, ux-documenter. Add to the known roles list. Each should resolve from model-profiles.json like existing roles.
v: grep -c 'fe-security' scripts/resolve-agent-model.sh returns >= 1; grep -c 'documenter' scripts/resolve-agent-model.sh returns >= 1

a: Update department TOON files to include new agents. (1) references/departments/backend.toon: add yolo-security row (already exists, verify), add yolo-documenter row (Backend Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write,Bash | docs.jsonl | 2000), update workflow step 10 to note per-dept security, add optional step 8.5 for documenter; (2) references/departments/frontend.toon: add yolo-fe-security row (FE Security Reviewer | Sonnet | Read,Grep,Glob,Bash,SendMessage | security-audit.jsonl | 3000), add yolo-fe-documenter row (FE Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | docs.jsonl | 2000), update workflow; (3) references/departments/uiux.toon: add yolo-ux-security row (UX Security Reviewer | Sonnet | Read,Grep,Glob,SendMessage | security-audit.jsonl | 2000), add yolo-ux-documenter row (UX Documenter | Haiku | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | docs.jsonl | 2000), update workflow; (4) references/departments/shared.toon: update note that Security is now per-department (shared.toon security is deprecated in favor of dept-specific agents, retained for backward compat).
v: grep -c 'documenter' references/departments/backend.toon returns >= 1; grep -c 'fe-security' references/departments/frontend.toon returns >= 1; grep -c 'ux-security' references/departments/uiux.toon returns >= 1

a: Update agents/yolo-lead.md to absorb Solution Q&A responsibilities. Add 'Solution Q&A' section after existing 'Review Ownership' section: (1) After Step 9 (QA) completes, Lead performs Solution Q&A review — verifies implementation solves original requirements, checks delivered artifacts against plan must-haves, validates cross-plan consistency; (2) Solution Q&A is NOT a separate agent — Lead owns this as part of sign-off authority; (3) Solution Q&A checklist: all plan mh.tr truths verified, all plan mh.ar artifacts exist, no unresolved escalations, verification.jsonl shows PASS or acceptable WARN, security-audit.jsonl shows PASS or acceptable WARN; (4) If Solution Q&A fails: Lead routes to Senior for remediation (same as QA fail path). Update Context table to include verification.jsonl and security-audit.jsonl in Receives column.
v: grep -c 'Solution Q&A' agents/yolo-lead.md returns >= 2; grep -c 'verification.jsonl' agents/yolo-lead.md returns >= 1
